name: Trainers
author: RiceKirby
summary: Do you want to be the very best, like no one ever was? Then prepare your Pokédex, gather your Poké Balls, catch the best Pokémon you can find and beat your opponents to prove you are worth the title of Pokémon Master!

sides.winmsg: The Wild Pokémon (~Players~) have been taught to understand the power that's inside them!
Red (~Players~) have become the very best, like no one ever was!
Blue (~Players~) have passed their real test of catching them all, achieving their cause of training them!
Green (~Players~) have traveled across the land and searched far and wide for all Pokémon!
Rival: ~Players~ are my best friends, in a world we must defend!
~Players~: It's you and Me(wtwo)... I know it's my destiny!

roles.help: You can use /inspect [name] during the night to find someone's ability! If a Trainer catches you, you will join their team (you get a slight buff if Green catches you)!
roles.info: Can inspect 1 person's ability during the night. If captured by Green, evades 50% of the nightkills. Sided with Wild Pokémon.

roles.help: You joined Green's team! You can use /inspect [name] during the night to find someone's ability! You also have a 50% chance of evading nightkills. [Hint: Use /myrole to check your teammates.]

inspect.broadcastmsg: Your teammate Bulbasaur is going to inspect ~Target~!

roles.help: You joined Red's team! You can use /inspect [name] during the night to find someone's ability! [Hint: Use /myrole to check your teammates.]

changelog.28.06.2014: Added Prevent Teamvote (use /teamvote to vote a teammate) and Update Team (team-reveal when a new pokémon is caught to your side). Added a few tips.
changelog.27.06.2014: Rival's Ditto now spawn instead of Green's Ditto on non-peak setups (because STAB was changed).
changelog.18.06.2014 [EXPERIMENTAL]: Changed some abilities around: Nightkillers with STAB now get a last kill when lynched instead. Distractors with STAB now get 2 distracts per turn, Stalkers are now Watchers (with STAB they also stalk). Snivy/Tepig/Oshawott now inspect players by their Type instead of their side. Mewtwo evades 1 distraction. Spawn changed so different Pokémon appear on each game.
changelog.17.06.2014: Mewtwo's expose no longer has recharge and is immune to Stalk/Watch.

changelog2.28.05.2014: Changed the message a player receives when captured.
changelog2.08.03.2014: Ditto's convert message now tells which pokémon he turned into.
changelog2.24.11.2013: Fixed Rival so it won't trade a Pokémon for the same one.
changelog2.11.11.2013: Added Rival, a trainer with low catch priority, 3 captures per night and can trade (convert) their pokémon into another one.
changelog2.01.10.2013: Added TeamTalk to Red, Blue and Green teams.
changelog2.07.09.2013: Pansage/Pansear/Panpour added as Wild Poisoners. Wobbuffet added as Wild Bomb (no STAB). Smeargle changed into Mew and sided with Mewtwo. Broadcast for captured Pokémon added.
changelog2.31.07.2013: Spawn List expanded to allow for 40+ players.
changelog2.26.07.2013: Wild Pokémon coded as Village to reduce stalemates and end games faster.
changelog2.21.06.2013: /dex reduced to 1 charge. Broadcast added to Trainers' /catch and /get. Shedinja now ignores distractors and gets a vote of +3. Mewtwo now kill Inspectors. Spawn Lists tweaked.
changelog2.16.06.2013: /runaway's priority is now higher than Trainers' /catch and /get (Orphan Pokemon can now flee and get captured at the same night).
changelog2.15.06.2013: Daykillers now appear earlier. Fixed Wild Ditto unable to use their actions when copying a killer.
changelog2.07.06.2013: Captured Pokémon can now /runaway after their Trainer dies to become Wild again.
changelog2.31.05.2013: Added 'Use /myrole' to roles' help text. Ditto now have no initialrecharge when transforming into a killer/daykiller. Fixed roles that allowed teamkill.
changelog2.29.05.2013: /catch command split into /catch and /get to balance captures.
changelog2.28.05.2013.c: Mewtwo can't expose on small games. Trainers are inspected as Inspectors by Bulbasaur/Charmander/Squirtle. Shedinja reveals as Mayor.
changelog2.28.05.2013.b: Mewtwo's /expose now can only be used every 2 days. Mewtwo appears later. Trainers can /catch twice per turn.
changelog2.28.05.2013.a: Removed 'Release on Death' rule for trainers. Trainers can now /catch N1. Charges for /dex was reduced from 3 to 2. Roles/Captures are public now.

tips.Trainers: Aim to catch Pokémon that match your type (e.g: If you are Green, aim for Grass-type) so they get a bonus ability.
tips.Captured Pokémon: If your Trainer dies, you don't need to run. It's sometimes better to not run away so you keep your teammates and bonus ability (if any).
